title: [Medicine] Researchers looked at more than 1,700 skincare products labeled “natural” and found that 90% of them contained common allergens

[Epidemiology] Guillain–Barré syndrome (GBS) was temporally associated with adenovirus-vector COVID-19 vaccines. 41 total cases of GBS were reported following Vaxzevria (n = 38), Comirnaty (n = 3), or Spikevax (n = 0) between February and November 2021. Only Vaxzevria exceeded the expected rate of GBS.
